description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bj1h","text":"This is a comprehensive protocol for using the Franklin qPCR (Biomeme Inc.) machine to detect the presence of Bonamia ostreae parasite in European flat oyster (Ostrea edulis). Previous methods relied on sacrificially dissecting animals to perform histology. While sensitive, these methods were destructive and untested animals carrying Bonamia ostreae are not detected. Here, we present a non-invasive alternative method to detect Bonamia ostreae from Ostrea edulis pseudofaeces/faeces using a portable qPCR machine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":110,"length":16},{"style":"italic","offset":160,"length":13},{"style":"italic","offset":336,"length":16},{"style":"italic","offset":431,"length":16},{"style":"italic","offset":452,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Bonamia ostrea,Ostrea edulis,qPCR,Real-Time PCR,Environmental DNA,in-situ detection

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"57r01","text":"Separate collected animals and cover with seawater (approx.   for every   of live animal). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2tbtr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ad6r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"5EBC6F6098BA11EDBED4775E34E6A429","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"0ABC2560AE0711ED916ACF527D397DB7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f4pag","text":"1) The volume of seawater used is a ballpark figure, which should allow for quite a bit of variation. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8uu2b","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5jhbk","text":"2) Ensure that animals from separate testing sites are held separately, with strict bio-security protocols in place to prevent cross contamination. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cqh0u","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8l88i","text":"3) Ensure animals are aerated and kept in a place with minimal disturbance to ensure they filter and produce faeces. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cehko","text":"Disinfect all equipment with working strength bleach according to biosecurity SOPs. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"albj0","text":"Use a syringe with a 1 uM pre-filter to remove the supernatant without debris. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d9el7","text":"Make two holes in the first M1 chamber and transfer sample into the Biomeme M1 cartridge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eklvc","text":"Place the Biomeme Go-Strip assay tubes into the Franklin device in the correct orientation (see Figure 5). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16eat","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jnaf","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6BB776C0B83011ED90589303157699A1","height":514.0000000000003,"id":381276,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"7jufo\",\"text\":\"Figure 5: Biomeme Go-Strip assay tubes placed in the correct orientation according to instructions\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"MicrosoftTeams-image (25).png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mwk8btcfx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mwk6btcfx.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mwk7btcfx.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mwk5btcfx.webp","width":385.6753069577083}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"de91p","text":"Use the Biomeme app on the phone to analyse the qPCR results to determine the presence of Bonamia ostreae. Refer to Figure 6 for an example of positive Bonamia ostreae presence. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":90,"length":17},{"style":"italic","offset":152,"length":16},{"style":"italic","offset":176,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9qe81","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dtt3","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"BB9171E0B82711ED8E13334EFEDC1587","height":481.6763636363633,"id":381280,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"9d86d\",\"text\":\"Figure 6: The green dots and the Cq values in the first row indicate positive Bonamia ostreae detection (based on a Cq value cut-off point of 35)\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[{\"style\":\"italic\",\"offset\":78,\"length\":27}],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"MicrosoftTeams-image (19).png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mwmcbtcfx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mwmabtcfx.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mwmbbtcfx.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mwk9btcfx.webp","width":222.43660789252715}}}}
